typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GROUP_PROVIDER_ID as integer,
		GROUP_NAME as string,
		{Provider_Group_Status            } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Address_1         } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Address_2         } as string,
		{Provider_Group_City              } as string,
		{Provider_Group_State_Code        } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Zip_Code          } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Contact           } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Phone             } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Fax               } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Email             } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Group_Date        } as string,
		{Provider_Group_End_Date          } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Type              } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Function_Indicator  } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Provider_Group_ID as string,
		Provider_Group_Name as string,
		Provider_Group_Status as string,
		Provider_Group_Address_1 as string,
		Provider_Group_Address_2 as string,
		Provider_Group_City as string,
		Provider_Group_State_Code as string,
		Provider_Group_Zip_Code as string,
		Provider_Group_Contact as string,
		Provider_Group_Phone as string,
		Provider_Group_Fax as string,
		Provider_Group_Email as string,
		Provider_Group_Group_Date as date,
		Provider_Group_End_Date as date,
		Provider_Group_Type as string,
		Provider_Group_Function_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source(output(
		Provider_Alternate_Identifier as string,
		Provider_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source3
source1, source2 lookup(GROUP_PROVIDER_ID == Provider_Group_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1, source3 lookup(GROUP_PROVIDER_ID == Provider_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
